tool.name: Monocle3 partition

param.name: reduction_method
param.label: The dimensionality reduction to base the clustering on.

param.name: knn
param.label: Number of nearest neighbours used for Louvain clustering.

param.name: weight
param.label: When this option is set, calculate the weight for each edge in the kNN graph.

param.name: louvain_iter
param.label: The number of iterations for Louvain clustering.

param.name: resolution
param.label: Resolution of clustering result, specifying the granularity of clusters. Not used by default and the standard igraph louvain clustering algorithm will be used.

param.name: partition_qval
param.label: The q-value threshold used to determine the partition of cells.
